basic.description: An advanced treatment of the concepts and applications of catalysis, including the kinetics of catalysis and topics selected from the areas of homogeneous, heterogeneous, and biocatalysis.
basic.subject: ENCH
basic.title: Catalysis

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQ:  ENCH 312 or CHEM 312 or ENCH 245 or CHEM 245 and registered in BSCE
